titles.title: Fairness to United States Distant Water Fishermen Act of 2016

To prohibit the use of funds to provide assistance to the Pacific Islands Forum Fisheries Agency under the Agreement Between the Government of the United States of America and the Pacific Islands Forum Fisheries Agency, and for other purposes.
Fairness to United States Distant Water Fishermen Act of 2016

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.

bill.summary:
Fairness to United States Distant Water Fishermen Act of 2016
This bill prohibits certain economic support funds from being used to provide assistance to the Pacific Islands Forum Fisheries Agency under the Agreement Between the Government of the United States of America and the Pacific Islands Forum Fisheries Agency.
Certain military education/training funds may not be used to provide assistance to any foreign country that is a party to the South Pacific Forum Fisheries Agency Convention, signed at Honiara (Solomon Islands) on July 10, 1979.
